name: Vive Ricochet
description:
Vive Ricochet is an indie game developed by five students at the University of California, Santa Cruz as part of the Computer Science: Computer Game Design senior capstone course. It features the item collection aspects of Katamari games with the fast paced, competitive nature of dodgeball. You pick stuff up. You throw it at your friends. What more could you ask for?
